name: Advance Importer
author: Coder618

sections.description:
A powerful plugin for import and export Post, Page, any Custom post type data, with any kind of attachments.
It work with native wordpress Importer and exporter.

Some highlighted features:
1. Import and Export with post/page/custom post type data with attachment(s) media
2. Support any attachment data type, eg. Image, PDF, Sound etc
3. Support Gutenberg editor data Import, ACF plugin Attachment Data import etc.

How to export
1. Go to Dashboard > Tools > Export
2. Select what to export (Post type) and and Tick the checkbox “Export with attachment(s)”
3. It will generate a XML file, which will help you to Import data

How to Import
1. Go to Dashboard > Tools > Import > Click “Run Importer” under WordPress Importer
2. Select the XML file and click Upload file and import
3. Tick the checkbox “Download and import file attachments” and Hit Submit

Documentation

For full documentation Please visit: https://coder618.github.io/advance-importer
sections.installation:
• Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress Dashboard.
  • Go to Settings > Advance importer for Adding specific meta-key field for attachment(s)
sections.faq:
Can I able to import attachment

Yes, This plugin will help you to import and export Any kind of Post data with relevant attachment.

Can I able to import Advanced custom fields(ACF) data

Yes, You can able to Import ACF plugin data with all attachment(s)
